post.text: "April 16, 2007—that was the worst day of my life. It was the worst day of so many people's lives. And for the parents and the loved ones of those kids and professors, that pain never goes away." —Tim Kaine on the shooting at Virginia Tech

comment.author: Kyle
comment.text: Hillary Clinton I hope this is a joke about having Debbie Wasserman as an honourary guest at the DNC? You're supposed to convince me to vote for you. This is not helping. How could you?

replies.author: Sierra
replies.text: Can you imagine what information Debbie has on Hillary

replies.author: Hayley
replies.text: Kyle , finally your eyes are open.
